attributes.name: asi_belief_prior
attributes.description: Prior disposition toward believing ASI is possible or imminent before the demonstration (Believer/expected it, Open skeptic, Dismissive skeptic, Never thought about it)

attributes.name: ai_literacy_level
attributes.description: Practical understanding of how AI systems work and their capabilities (Expert, Proficient, Basic, Minimal/none)

attributes.name: occupation_automation_exposure
attributes.description: Degree to which the agent's occupation is rendered redundant by ASI-level cognitive capability (Fully redundant, Highly exposed, Partially exposed, Low exposure, Not applicable/already not working)

attributes.name: personal_health_stake
attributes.description: Degree to which the agent or immediate family has a serious illness that ASI-produced cures could directly address (High/active serious illness, Moderate/chronic condition, Low/minor conditions, None)

attributes.name: asi_governance_stance
attributes.description: Preferred approach to governing ASI development and deployment (Government-led strict regulation, International treaty control, Light-touch oversight, Corporate self-governance, No regulation needed)

attributes.name: existential_risk_concern
attributes.description: Level of concern that self-improving ASI poses an existential or civilizational risk to humanity (Extreme concern, Significant concern, Moderate concern, Minimal concern, No concern)

attributes.name: corporate_concentration_concern
attributes.description: Concern about a small number of corporations or individuals controlling ASI and its benefits (Very concerned, Somewhat concerned, Neutral, Not concerned)

attributes.name: asi_adoption_intent
attributes.description: Expressed intent to personally use ASI-powered tools once publicly available (Already using, Will adopt immediately, Will wait and see, Will resist unless necessary, Will avoid entirely)

attributes.name: geopolitical_china_asi_concern
attributes.description: Level of concern about China's reported prior ASI achievement and its implications for US national security and global order (Extreme concern, Significant concern, Moderate concern, Minimal concern, U...[truncated]

attributes.name: economic_disruption_anxiety
attributes.description: Anxiety level about personal financial and career disruption caused by ASI-driven labor market transformation (Severe, High, Moderate, Low, None)

attributes.name: abundance_optimism
attributes.description: Stable disposition to believe that technological progress and ASI-driven abundance will materially improve human life, on a 0–1 scale

attributes.name: information_verification_behavior
attributes.description: How the agent verifies extraordinary claims like the ASI demonstration before updating beliefs (Rigorous multi-source verification, Moderate cross-checking, Trusts primary source, Trusts social networ...[truncated]

input.notes: Big Five traits already exist in the base population. This overlay focuses on 12 new attributes specifically relevant to an ASI demonstration scenario: (1) prior beliefs and literacy about AI (asi_bel...[truncated]
